group_1.narration: I came across a Magical Girl here in Kamihama:@Miss Kako Natsume.
She offered to help me find my friends,@and invited me to her house@to discuss things further...

group_1.textLeft: "Natsume Books"...@So your house is a bookstore.

group_1.textRight: Yes... used books, to be precise.@[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]Are you all right?

group_1.textLeft: All right? Why wouldn't I be?

group_1.textRight: Used bookstores have a particular smell, so some@people don't like them...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, don't worry about that.@Honestly, I quite like it.
It's the scent of the feelings of every person involved@with these books. Their authors, their readers...
It makes me feel like I'm hiding in the pocket of@the god of books.

group_1.textRight: The pocket of the god of books...

group_1.textLeft: Ah. That might've been a bit too dramatic.

group_1.textRight: No, I thought it was quite nice. It reminded me of a@novel I read once... I believe it was...
Umika Misaki!
I KNEW it!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? N-no, I just—@I didn't mean...

group_1.textRight: She's such a fascinating author!@I've read all her books!
She's a young author who doesn't often appear in@public. It's amazing to think that she's a professional,@despite still being in middle school like me...
I wonder what she looks like. There's rumors that@she's actually very pretty...

group_1.textLeft: T-that's... those rumors are overblown. Really.

group_1.textRight: Huh? Have you seen her in person?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, no, I mean... she said as much in an interview,@is all.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see.
She's very talented, though! Writing all those novels@while still attending school...
I imagine she's very stoic. I'd be so nervous@meeting her for real...

group_1.textLeft: I think... she might be a much more average student@than you might assume.

group_1.textRight: We have all of Umika Misaki's books together@on this shelf here.

group_1.textLeft: ...Right next to Daihachiro Furuyashiki-sensei's@"Flying Squirrel" series...

group_1.textRight: My father only puts his absolute favorite titles@on that shelf.
"Umika Misaki's characters embody the idea that@to eat is to live."
That's my father's "stance on Umika"!

group_1.textLeft: ...So there's people who understand here, too...

group_1.textRight: Um... did I say anything odd?

group_1.textLeft: No, no. I was just very happy to hear that.

group_1.textRight: Ah... oh, now that I think about it.
I still haven't asked you your name!
